122.content:
Option 1- Becky was the average anthro in this world, eating humans whenever she got the chance to, while keeping her job as a landlord for the apartment building she owned.

Option 2- Suzy was a freak science experiment gone wrong whenever the government mixed her dna with a Gator and turned her into the ten foot tall invincible monster she is today. She lives in the bayou, but is just starting her unkillable revenge by eating any human who crosses her.
122.title: Crocodile

1222.content:
You look down at your naked scaly body in disgust and anger at what they did to you. Humans were a cruel set of people, turning on their win after they look a little different. That doesn't matter now though, after they attacked you unsuccessfully they had outcast you from their kind. You were the only one of your kind. You were Suzy, the invincible anthro alligator, and you were out for revenge.

Climbing out of the muddy swamp you looked at the sun as it slowly rose from behind the horizon. You look in the distance at a small house on the swamp, a pickup truck parked out back and a man drunkenly arguing with his crying wife. You lick your lips in anticipation as you creep up towards the door. You kick open the door and hear them both scream as they flee to separate rooms.

You follow the man as he runs to the bathroom and picks up a 12 gauge shotgun, aiming it at your face and pumping you full of lead. You can only laugh as the bullets bounce off your grinning teeth and he realizes his fate as your meal. You pick the man up by hid chest and kiss him before opening your lips and placing him on your tongue. You give a gulp before moving to the bedroom to find his crying wife behind the bed.

She screams as you come closer to her and rip off her clothes with your teeth. She cries harder as you lick your lips which you wrap around her squirming body and shove her into your jaw before sending her down to reunite with her husband. You burp off the two before you
1222.title: Suzy the Outcast Anthro

131.content:
You have 2 options.

You can be Andrew, a gargantuan 6'4 200 guy. Going down this path will involve plenty of involvement with vore; Andrew runs experiments quite a lot, knows the ins and outs of the art, and also "helps" the girls with their own experiments, although plenty of times does not actually volunteer to do this. Despite being so big, Andrew is actually very bad at defending against vore attacks from other girls. This is because Andrew will more often than not actually refuse to hit a girl, and this leads to them overpowering Andrew quite easily. Thankfully, Andrew does not carry this policy over to other guys. This is where Andrew's massive frame comes into full effect, as no guy in the school can claim to be as good at this particular subject as Andrew is, and as such, no guy will ever defeat Andrew 1 on 1.

Your other option is Carl. Carl is much smaller, clocking in at 5'5 120. Carl is unfortunately too small to make very much use of his undeveloped vore power, and often finds himself on the menu for the class' girls. Carl knows a lot about vore, but unfortunately has an undeveloped power as a whole thanks to his inability to actually use most of what he has learned.

Who do you want to go with?
131.title: Boy

151.title: Pokémon

1512.content: How will the little cutie devour you?
1512.title: Mew

15121.content: A pink glow surrounded you, both shrinking you and lifting you into the air. A pink cat, the Pokemon Mew, teleported in front of you, her long tail swishing as she gazed at the trainer she had. Before you could question what was going on, you were yanked through the air and pressed against a furry belly, which let out a hungry gurgle. You look up at the Mon, who smiled and licked her lips before opening her maw, showing you her gleaming teeth and open gullet. You let out a gasp of terror before Mew clamped her maw around your head. The pink Pokemon purred and closed her eyes as she ran her tongue over your head, soaking in your wonderful taste. Her pink ears twitched as your muffled screams, and she giggled in response before focusing on her meal's clothing. With a wave of her paw, her food was stripped bare. Now with her clothes taken care of, Mew turned her attention to consuming the trainer. With a loud gulp, she swallowed your head and took in your chest. Her happy purrs rumbled around you as she ran her tongue over your plump breasts. You were grossed out, but you couldn't do squat. After a bit, Mew swallowed again, taking in your belly. Her sharp teeth brushed against your soft flesh, and you whince as you realized how lucky you were that Mew was holding you still. The moment you finish this thought, Mew swallowed again, you rear entering her jaws, renewing your fears once more as you realize how close you were to be flab on her hips. Mew growled happily as she rubbed her throat, slurping down your legs and giving your feet a farewell taste before swallowing, sealing her meal in her belly. You found yourself able to move, and you promptly start kicking and thrashing. Mew giggled as she watched you hopelessly struggle, her acids getting to work, kneeding her belly to help her victim melt. Minutes later, the Pokemon belched loudly, your skull flying from her maw. She giggled gleefully before looking over her shoulder and smirking at her plump rear before teleporting off.
15121.title: Oral

15321.content:
It all began one day in Camden Town UK as you happened to be a friendly male anthropomorphic corgi dog who happens to be a cousin of the royal corgis, as you happened to be a successful and well known owner of a well known and highly respected outdoor and indoor restaurant as your outdoor and indoor restaurant's also got rave reviews and 5 star ratings as well.

As the customers were having lunch at your outdoor and indoor restaurant that day in Camden Town, their day was about to take an unexpected turn as a giant monster known as the Doggy Dough Girl was making her way towards Camden Town as an urgent news report appeared on every TV screen in Camden Town and London city as you and everyone else turned your attention to one of your restaurant's big screen TV monitors that was on.

"Ladies and gentlemen we are receiving breaking news courtesy of the BBC network as a giant dough monster is currently on the loose as we're now going to turn it over to our reporter Roxy Rottweiler, Roxy can you tell us what's happening out there?" A male British bulldog anchorman asked.

"As you can see it's total chaos and pandemonium here on the streets of Camden Town as air raid sirens are going off and countless citizens are running for their lives as the Doggy Dough Girl is causing a total panic as she's currently stomping her way through the city's streets as she's also eating everything in sight." Roxy Rottweiler said as she reported live from the streets of downtown Camden Town.

As you and your customers were watching everything unfold on TV the sound of giant footsteps approaching filled the air as the lights started to blink as the big screen TVs monitors faded in and out whilst the customers and staff started to panic as you ran towards the restaurant's doorway and opened the restaurant's front doors as a gigantic fat shadow loomed over you and your restaurant as the Doggy Dough Girl with a hungry expression on her face looked inside your restaurant's windows as your customers and staff members fled for their lives in a panic as they evacuated the restaurant.

"What a scrumptious looking restaurant I can eat!" The Doggy Dough Girl said as she picked up your restaurant with her own two paws as she held the building and you the building's owner high in the air as she hungrily eyed both the building and you the building's owner as you addressed the giant dough monster herself.

"Now listen here Madame put down my restaurant at once you evil vile unbaked cake you whoa!" You said as you demanded the Doggy Dough Girl put down your restaurant at once.

But sadly to no avail she didn't listen as she started to eat the restaurant itself as....
15321.title: Dolly

153214.content:
Ok, so there are two stories here.

One is Where Hunter DeVil tries to use a device to catch the puppies, only for it to malfunction and somehow shrink him. Dolly comes across him, and decides to get back for him nearly capturing her family, and challenges him to a game of hide or seek, and if she finds him, then its time to digest. Unfortunally for him, he loses, and now his fate is Dalmatian hips.

The other one is more a story oriented thing. You are mysteriously shrunken, and come across some very predatory(to small animals, with the exception of Big Fee and Sid) pups. Dolly offers to help you, but you are not guaranteed to not end up in a belly.

Take your pick.
